mapper.select: select * from booking where id=#{id} order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into booked (bno, id, roomNo, startDate, stay, people, totalPrice) values (booked_seq.nextval, #{id }, #{roomNo }, #{startDate }, #{stay }, #{people }, #{totalPrice})
insert into booking (roomNo, bno, stayDate, id, bookingNo, people) values (#{roomNo }, #{bno }, #{stayDate }, #{id }, booking_seq.nextval, #{people })
mapper.delete: delete from booking where stayDate=#{stayDate} and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select roomNo, rSize, price from room order by roomNo asc
select a.roomNo, to_char(stayDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')stayDate from booking a, booked b where a.id=#{id} and stayDate >= sysdate and a.id=b.id and a.bno=b.bno and b.inoutck = 1 order by stayDate asc
select * from booking where roomNo=#{roomNo } and stayDate=#{stayDate }

select * from ( select rownum rnum, id, to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')startDate, stay, inoutck,roomNo from booked where startDate = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd')order by id,startDate ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from ( select rownum rnum, id, inoutck, roomNo, to_char(startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd')startDate, stay, bno, people, totalPrice from booked where id = #{id}order by startDate ) where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select bno from booked where id=#{id} and startDate=#{startDate} and roomNo=#{roomNo}
